description: This bright and refreshing drink has a floral,&nbsp;fruity flavor that's accentuated by pear brandy mixed with lemon juice. It also gets an extra kick from&nbsp;absinthe to add some botanical aromas to it!
name: Last Resort

recipeInstructions.name: Rinse the inside of a chilled cocktail or coupe glass with the absinthe, then remove any excess. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the pear brandy, lime juice, simple syrup, and egg white into a cocktail shaker. Shake vigorously to emulsify the egg whites.

recipeInstructions.name: Add some ice into the shaker, then shake it again. Shake well until chilled.

recipeInstructions.name: Double-strain it into the prepared coupe glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish it with some freshly grated nutmeg and 3 dashes of Peychaud's Bitters.
